Articles.Content: Hello, I noticed a small thing that would peoples lives easier: Make the thrust vector indicator in the VAB (pink thingy) and the Center of Lift indicator longer respectively extend over the lenght of the whole vehicle of building - in any way, make aligning these points easier. Up until now, the alignment of the thrust vector, center of mass and center of lift have to be eyeballed - it would be nice if those vectors and points could be aligned with the visual aid easier.

Yea its a bit hard aligning it when you make some wacky planes,but i think it has been suggested before.

I too have an idea about this, there could be a small text box that gives you a numerical value about how much your COM and COL are misaligned.
